Our Values

Patients must be able to trust the Dental Team

To justify that, we as professionals maintain a high standard of practice and care.


We promise to:

  • Make the care of patients our first concern
  • Treat every patient politely and considerately
  • Have respect for patients dignity and privacy
  • Listen to patients and respect their views
  • Give patients information in a way which they can understand
  • Respect the rights of patients to be involved fully in decisions about their care
  • Act quickly to protect patients from risks
  • Keep our professional knowledge and skills up to date
  • Be honest and trustworthy
  • Respect and protect confidential information
  • Work with other medical and dental colleagues, to best serve the patients interests

Multi-Award Winning Dentistry

Somercotes Dental Practice is a modern, diverse and multi-cultural dental practice that has been designed with setting the Gold Standard in Dental Care provision in mind and consistently demonstrates steadfast dedication and commitment to providing a highly professional and friendly service to both NHS and Private patients alike.

Testimonials

Don't just take it from us. See what our patients say.

“I was really nervous but they were so efficient and kind that there wasn't anything to be worried about. It was quick, painless and they explained everything really well. Brilliant!”
